department.ch: 能源工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: "This course introduces the fundamental theory and category of heat exchangers. Heat exchangers are basic device for thermal management and have a wide application. Topics include double-pipe, shell-and-tube, fin-and-tube, compact, and heat pipe heat exchangers."
goal.ch: 本課程介紹熱交換器的種類及原理，熱交換器是熱處理的基本工具，其應用非常廣泛，而且與能源有緊密的結合，課程深入的探討設計方法及多種熱交換器，包含Double-Pipe、Shell-and-Tube、Fin-and-Tube、Compact及Heat Pipe Heat Exchangers，學生將對熱交換器的原理有深入的了解，並能依需要選擇及設計適當的熱交換器。

content.en:
"1. Introduction: basic concept, classification, and design consideration
2. Design methodology: Design requirements, variables and thermal circuit, temperature distribution, LMTD method, ?-NTU method, limiting behavior, fin performance and selection, and cost estimation
3. Double-pipe heat exchangers: description, thermal and hydraulic design, heat transfer and pressure drop evaluations, and performance and design calculations
4. Shell-and-tube heat exchangers: description, selection criteria, mechanisms of shell-side flow, controlling parameters, heat transfer and pressure drop evaluations, and calculational procedures
5. Fin-and-tube heat exchangers: description, heat transfer and friction characteristics, extended surface geometries, and design calculations
6. Special topics: compact heat exchangers, heat pipes, plate fin heat exchangers, etc"
content.ch:
授課內容：
1. 基礎介紹
2. 設計方法及需求
3. 熱交換器溫度分佈，LMTD方法及?-NTU方法
4. 鰭片的性能及選擇與成本估算
5. 套管式熱交換器
6. 殼管式熱交換器
7. 鰭管式熱交換器
8. 其他熱交換器
